      • loadConfig

        public static void loadConfig(Config config,
                              String filename)
                       throws UncheckedIOException
        This does (hopefully) overwrite config settings if they are defined in the file. So you can do 
         Config config = ConfigUtils.createConfig() ;
 config.xxx().setYyy() ; // set some defaults for your application.
 ConfigUtils.loadConfig( config, filename ) ; // read user-defined options
 config.aaa().bbb() ; // set config options which you don't want the user to potentially overwrite.
 ...
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • loadConfig

        public static void loadConfig(Config config,
                              URL url)
                       throws UncheckedIOException
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • loadConfig

      • modifyFilePaths

        public static void modifyFilePaths(Config config,
                                   String pathPrefix)
        Adds the pathPrefix in front of all supported file-paths in core-config groups in the configuration, except when the paths are specified as absolute paths. This is useful e.g. if the configuration contains file-paths relative to the location of the config-file. The currently supported file-paths are:
        • global.localDtdBase
        • controler.outputDirectory
        • network.inputNetworkFile
        • plans.inputPlansFile
        • facilities.inputFacilitiesFile
        • counts.inputCountsFile
        • world.inputWorldFile
        • households.inputFile
        • roadpricing.tollLinksFile
        Parameters:
        config -
        pathPrefix -

      • addOrGetModule

        public static <T extends ConfigGroup> T addOrGetModule(Config config,
                                                       Class<T> moduleClass)
        Convenience method to all addOrGetModule with only two arguments.
        Parameters:
        config -
        moduleClass -
        Returns:
        instance of moduleClass inside config

      • addOrGetModule

        public static <T extends ConfigGroup> T addOrGetModule(Config config,
                                                       String groupName,
                                                       Class<T> moduleClass)
        This is a refactoring device to remove former core config groups from the core config. Instructions: If you want to remove e.g. Config.vspExperimental(), replace that method with ConfigUtils.addOrGetModule(this, VspExperimentalConfigGroup.GROUP_NAME, VspExperimentalConfigGroup.class) and then hit Refactor/Inline.
